text: Haselbach is a municipality in Straubing-Bogen in Bavaria, Germany. ==Geography== Haselbach is in the southern borders of the Bavarian Forest, about 11 kilometres (6,8 miles) north of the river Danube. The municipality has the village of Haselbach as well as 49 other named districts. ==References== Category:Straubing-Bogen
title: Haselbach, Bavaria
